import React, { useState } from "react"; import AuthService from "../services/auth.service"; import AthleteService from "../services/athlete.service"; const Profile = (props) => { let sexes = ["Male", "Female", "Other"]; //console.log("hedhi hya" + props.userId); const [user, setUser] = useState({ gender: null, weight: null, height: null, }); let inputElement = sexes.map((gender) => ( )); const currentUser = AuthService.getCurrentUser(); const [openedDiseasesList, setOpenedDiseasesList] = useState(false); const openDiseaseList = () => setOpenedDiseasesList(true); const closeDiseaseList = () => setOpenedDiseasesList(false); const handleInput = (e) => { setUser({ ...user, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const updateUserData = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); AthleteService.updateUser(props.userId, user).then( (response) => {}, (error) => {} ); }; return (
